name: device_openPartial
description: This function is used to partially open a specified SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to partially open.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action for partially opening the device.
